City.Title: Lvov
City.Description: Lvov is a city in western Ukraine. Capital of the historical region of Galicia, Lvov is now regarded as one of the main cultural centres of today's Ukraine.

City.Title: Kiev
City.Description: Kiev  is the capital and the largest city of Ukraine, located in the north central part of the country on the Dnieper River.

City.Title: Stockholm
City.Description: Stockholm is the capital and the largest city of Sweden and constitutes the most populated urban area in Scandinavia.

City.Name: London
City.Description: London  is the capital city of England and the United Kingdom, the largest metropolitan area in the United Kingdom, and the largest urban zone in the European Union by most measures.

City.Name: Cambridge
City.Description: Cambridge is a university town and the administrative centre of the county of Cambridgeshire, England.
